scripts.reset-db: npx sequelize-cli db:drop --config ./src/config/config.json && npx sequelize-cli db:create --config ./src/config/config.json && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config ./src/config/config.json --migrations-path ./src/migrations  && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config ./src/config/config.json --seeders-path ./src/seeders
